docstr: `ISATTY` — Whether a unit is a terminal device. ### Description Determine whether a unit is connected to a terminal device. ### Syntax `RESULT = ISATTY(UNIT)` ### Arguments . ### Return value Returns `.TRUE.` if the `UNIT` is connected to a terminal device, `.FALSE.` otherwise. ### Example ``` PROGRAM test_isatty   INTEGER(kind=1) :: unit   DO unit = 1, 10     write(*,*) isatty(unit=unit)   END DO END PROGRAM ``` ### Standard GNU extension ### Class Function ### See also TTYNAM
